Name: pieter k
Title: N/A
Description: Good looking shoe but pretty much unwearable for me personally because of how shallow the toe box is. Sadly, this only started to become apparent after breaking them in, once the crease across the toe box had formed. Since the shoe is made entirely from synthetic materials this discomfort is unlikely to clear over time. They seemed comfortable at first but after a solid day of wear it now feels like torture with the crease digging into my toes at every step.I ordered half a size up as recommended. Other than the aforementioned vertical narrowness I did not notice any discomforts, although the shoe overall is admittedly on the narrow side. For those with exceptionally wide feet this may not offer a good fit.
